channel.title: SAGRA. on Adolfo Álvarez
channel.description: Recent content in SAGRA. on Adolfo Álvarez

item.title: Recombining observations in cluster analysis: the SAGRA method
item.description: This thesis wants to answer the question of how we can recombine this small homogeneous groups to reconstruct the structure of the data set

item.title: Recombining partitions from multivariate data: a clustering method on Bayes factors
item.description: We introduce SAGRA (Split And Group Recombining Algorithm), a cluster analysis methodology which split the data set into small homogeneous groups and later recombine those groups using Bayes factors.
